algorithm_technique: Hashmap to store phrases by their last word, then iterate and check for matches.
problem_summary_simple: Combine phrases where the last word of one matches the first word of another.
problem_summary_technical: Uses a hashmap to group phrases by their last word, then iterates through phrases to find matches and construct new phrases.
key_insights: Efficiently finding matching words is key; a hashmap (defaultdict) mapping the last word to indices of phrases is ideal.
Handling phrases with only one word requires special care in finding the first/last word.
Using a set for results automatically handles distinctness, and sorting at the end meets the output requirement.
